aiBlock.inputPlaceholder: Write your idea and generate pros and cons
aiBlock.tooltipText: Write your idea and generate pros and cons using AI. For example: the idea of getting a parrot

aiIdea.required: You must enter the text of the idea
aiIdea.pattern: AI idea can only contain letters, numbers, dots, coma and hyphens
aiIdea.minLength: AI idea must be at least 6 characters long
aiIdea.maxLength: AI idea must not exceed 300 characters
